content.rendered:
Standard Single Room

Standard Single room is available with either double or single beds. Designed in an open-concept living area, it comes with oversized windows and lots of in-room facilities.

Details

  • Adults: 1
  • Amenities: air-conditioning, free wi-fi, hairdryer, in-room safe, minibar, oversized windows
  • View: Central Park
  • Size: 25m²
  • Categories: single

Prices start at: $150 for 3 nights (+taxes and fees)

View Details


Classic Double Room

Classic Double Room is available with a queen size bed. It’s a one-bedroom apartment with a private bathroom and terrace.

Details

  • Adults: 2
  • Amenities: air-conditioning, free wi-fi, hairdryer, in-room safe, minibar, pet-friendly
  • View: Central Park
  • Size: 30m²
  • Bed Type: 1 queen size bed
  • Categories: double

Prices start at: $180 for 3 nights (+taxes and fees)

View Details


Comfort Double Room

Comfort Double room is a newly renovated studio apartment with breathtaking city views. Rest, shot moments and even enjoy a fully equipped work-from-home space.

Details

  • Adults: 2
  • Amenities: air-conditioning, free wi-fi, hairdryer, in-room safe, minibar, pet-friendly
  • View: Central Park
  • Size: 40m²
  • Bed Type: 1 queen size bed
  • Categories: double

Prices start at: $225 for 3 nights (+taxes and fees)

View Details
